title: Darrell Bishop, Seasoned Capital Markets Professional, Joins Exro as President, Finance and Investor Relations - Yahoo Finance
content: Darrell Bishop, Seasoned Capital Markets Professional, Joins Exro as President, Finance and Investor Relations  Yahoo Finance
description: Exro Technologies Inc. (TSX: EXRO) (OTCQB: EXROF) (the "Company" or "Exro"), a leading clean technology company that has developed a new class of power electronics for electric motors and batteries, announced today that Darrell Bishop, a proven industry leader with extensive capital markets experience, joins the Exro team as President, Finance and Investor Relations. Bishop will be based of Exro's U.S. headquarters in Mesa, Arizona, but will equally split his time between the Company's Mesa, Ari
